EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering

Untitled Document
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for registering to attend this upcoming live webinar.
Meanwhile, get some valuable insights on Salesforce Release Management Best Practices by subscribing to our blog for regular updates on offers and topics that are of interest to you. You can also visit our other resources mentioned below.
Using AutoRABIT is very simple and convenient. Check it out here
We look forward to your participation in this upcoming event. If you want to make sure your system is all set to view the webinar prior to go-live, you can test your system now.
